summary: CAR HESITATES WHILE DRIVING. YOU CAN FEEL IT HARD SHIFT IN 5TH GEAR. CHECK ENGINE LIGHT COMES RANDOMLY ON SHOWING CODE FOR A MIS-FIRE IN CYLINDER 5.  TOOK TO DEALERSHIP AND HAD FIXED (SUPPOSEDLY) AND NOT COVERED BY WARRANTY. CAR STILL CONTINUES TO MISFIRE AND SURGE IN 5TH GEAR. HAD MECHANIC CHANGE OUT ALL SPARK PLUGS BUT THE COMPUTER STILL READS MISFIRE.  EVERY OTHER GEAR SEEMS FINE. CAR IDLES ROUGH WHILE STOPPED AND IF YOU LET FOOT OFF THE BRAKE IT SHAKES LIKE ITS GOING TO FALL TO PIECES. I'VE OWNED THE CAR FOR JUST OVER A YEAR AND ITS SPENT MORE TIME IN THE SHOP OR SITTING THAN I'VE BEEN ABLE TO DRIVE.
